message:
SYSTEM: ReposGH_in_Zenodo.pdf: Página 3
Integration of GitHub repositories in Zenodo
Introduction
3
Advantages of integration in Zenodo:
o allows users to have unique ownership over their collections.
o accepts research products in many forms.
o made specifically for the scientific community.
o assign a DOI to each dataset and also to each publication.
o safely storage for the future.
o supposed to be always for free.
speaker: SYSTEM
